channel.title: Chromatic Sketch
channel.description: Create good-looking and perceptually uniform gradients and color scales.

item.title: Version 2.0.0
item.description:
• A proper UI that let's you preview and customize the gradient or color scale
  • You can now use the Lch, HSL and RGB color modes in addition to Lab
  • Support for colors with alpha

item.title: Version 1.0.2
item.description: • Added support for Sketch's new system for updating plugins

item.title: Version 1.0.1
item.description: • Now supports gradients with more than two colors (was a bug)
